name: Dice Land
description:
Face off against the evil dice lord!!!

How to Play- Click on dice to roll. Once you've defeated a dice check your inventory to see if you have new dice to equip. Equip dice by clicking on the dice slot first and then clicking on the dice you'd like to equip. New lands will be unlocked based on how many enemies you kill.

Good luck and have fun!
